Luanti.description:
Formerly known as Minetest. An open source voxel game engine clone of the popular Minecraft. Luanti Docs.

Based on a custom OCI image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

PGID.description: Valid GID to use along with the above UID. It (or the above UID) must have full permissions to the Share mapped in the previous step.
PGID.label: GID

PUID.description: Valid UID to run Luanti as. Must have full permissions to the Share mapped in the previous step.
